title: Agriculture
content: Look at this huge green tractor! It has giant wheels that help it move on dirt and grass. Tractors are special machines that help farmers grow our food.

educational.kindergarten: Look at this huge green tractor! It has giant wheels that help it move on dirt and grass. Tractors are special machines that help farmers grow our food.
educational.firstgrade: Look at this huge green tractor! It has giant wheels that help it move through dirt and mud. Tractors are powerful machines that help farmers grow our food. The tractor is pulling heavy equipment to get the soil ready for planting seeds.
educational.secondgrade: Look at this huge green tractor with giant wheels! This big machine helps farmers work in their fields. The tractor can pull heavy tools to plant seeds or harvest crops. Farmers use tractors like this to grow the food we eat every day.
educational.thirdgrade: Look at this huge green tractor working in a farm field! This powerful machine helps farmers prepare the soil for planting crops. The tractor has giant wheels that help it move through dirt and mud without getting stuck. Farmers use tractors like this one to pull heavy equipment that breaks up the soil, making it ready for seeds to grow into the food we eat.
educational.fourthgrade: Look at this powerful green tractor working in a field! This heavy machine uses its big wheels and strong engine to pull farming tools that help prepare soil for planting crops. The tractor's large tires spread out its weight so it doesn't sink into soft dirt. Farmers use tractors like this to grow the food we eat every day. What do you think would happen if this tractor tried to work in your backyard?
educational.fifthgrade: This powerful green tractor is hard at work in a farmer's field! Tractors like this one use engines and hydraulics to pull heavy equipment that prepares soil for planting crops. The large wheels help distribute the tractor's weight so it doesn't get stuck in soft dirt. Modern farming machines like this help farmers grow the food we eat every day. What other kinds of simple machines do you think might be working inside this tractor?
